body_html:
@facaiy You are right, there are some difference between 1.4 and master branch. As you said I just replaced the modified part, It seems that the operation can only be "SAME" and "VALID":

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.4/tensorflow/python/framework/op_def_library.py#L688
ValueError: Attr 'padding' of 'Conv2D' Op passed string 'CAUSAL' not in: "SAME", "VALID".

Currently, I haven't found a place to specify "SAME" and "VALID" in source code.

body:
@facaiy You are right, there are some difference between 1.4 and master branch. As you said I just replaced the modified part, It seems that the operation can only be "SAME" and "VALID":

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.4/tensorflow/python/framework/op_def_library.py#L688
`ValueError: Attr 'padding' of 'Conv2D' Op passed string 'CAUSAL' not in: "SAME", "VALID".`

Currently, I haven't found a place to specify "SAME" and "VALID" in source code.
